## Use of KFAS in scientific papers and books

KFAS has been used in many scientific papers and books, but as there haven't been a corresponding paper available, the citation style has varied and most of the citations cannot be found systematically from anywhere. So here is a collection of known papers which mention KFAS, collected manually from various sources.
